verbose_text: In addition, studies relating PD-L1 expression to disease outcome have been done in most tumours, and the results show that PD-L1 expression strongly correlates with unfavourable prognosis in kidney XREF_BIBR, ovarian XREF_BIBR, bladder XREF_BIBR, breast XREF_BIBR, liver XREF_BIBR, gastric XREF_BIBR, and pancreatic cancer XREF_BIBR, but not in non small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) XREF_BIBR.
